body_html: After changing OMP_NUM_THREADS it still takes the seq2seq tutorial more than 2 hours. It's not a lot of data and the model so it seems to me to be too slow. Also when I ran my model and data with theano it was much faster although I ran it on CPU as well

body: After changing OMP_NUM_THREADS  it still takes the seq2seq tutorial more than 2 hours. It's not a lot of data and the model  so it seems to me to be too slow. Also when I ran my model and data with theano it was much faster although I ran it on CPU as well
